short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts measurement units easily and quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EasyConvert is designed to keep you focused while converting measurements. No more alt-tabbing to find conversions! Instantly switch between kilometers and miles, liters and gallons, and more. Stay efficient and simplify your measurements with EasyConvert.
